name: Bonfire (itch) (thaSeNNiN, Crazy Sunshine, Xavier2679)
description:
You are a cold man who has to survive the harshness of winter all the while citizens come from nearby areas to steal your fire, you have to fend them off by passing them a torch. If you don't, they will steal the fire and damage your fire in the process - making you lose!

Try to survive through this hard day without dying in the process!
